html:
10.13.22  1:17 am   What is money

      it's a place holder for what someone might value

10.13.22  1:11 am   have you ever transcribed/covered christian/gospel music?

     sure

     was it helpful and fun?

      yes

10.13.22  12:11 am   I've been a fan of yours for decades, and I've been dying to know: where do you get your ideas from?

      right over there

10.12.22  11:34 pm   Can you release a video that's a commentary of all the songs and videos on your website?
Like a director's/artist's commentary

      sure

10.12.22  10:54 pm   if you could change the color of something what would be?

      the rainbow

10.12.22  9:25 pm   what is the best face to carve into a jack-o-lantern?

      yours

10.12.22  8:21 pm   are the 2 friends on the beach the same people who bumped into each other in "I'm a huge gamer most of the time" 

      no

10.12.22  8:06 pm   Do you intentionally hide small Easter eggs in your videos, such as in '2 friends on the beach', or do we just happen to stumble across some small details in your animations?

      i like to make things real, even if you almost can't see it. that's because it reminds me of the real world, with many real things that we almost can't see

10.12.22  6:57 pm   how do I optimize my speaking

      you could use the '1 word' rule. try to express everything in 1 word

10.12.22  6:21 pm   in what year was the war of 1812

      1812-1815

10.12.22  5:28 pm   how do i draw

      start by placing a dot somewhere on the page

10.12.22  5:24 pm   is there a favourite dance you like

      it's a tie between walking and standing still

10.12.22  3:58 pm   how do you get ideas that are stuck in your head out onto a piece of paper for planning

      just write/describe them in english, or draw them. other field-specific notation may help, for example if it's a musical melody, staff notation might help. but nowadays most people probably don't even use paper. just record an audio memo

10.12.22  3:29 pm   How much of the arrangement/instrumentation of a song do you have in mind before you enter the production phase?

      about as much as can be played with 2 hands on a plain rhodes keyboard sound, vocal, and metronome. the tempo will be exact, and the roadmap will be exact all the way to the end

10.12.22  3:29 pm   what do you think of snakes

      can't tell where one snake ends and the next one begins

10.12.22  3:28 pm   did u like calling the devil

      the devil only accepts text messages

10.12.22  3:10 pm   I want to quit my job, should I do it?

      it all depends on what else you may do

10.12.22  2:16 pm   will you be making any jack-o'-lantern's this month?

      no

10.12.22  1:34 pm   do you ever feel superior.

     to what

     is that wrong

      it would be wrong and impossible if there was no other item to compare to. superior is a comparing word, to compare one thing to another. no 1 thing can be 'superior' without another thing to compare to

10.12.22  11:52 am   Is there too much pancake in your pancake?

      no, it's just the right amount. thank you for checking

10.12.22  11:41 am   who is the queen?

      could be you

10.12.22  11:03 am   is it ok to watch your videos on acid,

     sure

      im not going to do it if youre not ok with it.

10.12.22  11:02 am   have you ever used the golden ratio in your music?

      not on purpose

10.12.22  10:49 am   what was the best picture you bought
also what was the worst picture you bought
?

      i've never bought a picture

10.12.22  10:25 am   What are you running from in the song "and the day goes on"?

      the beginning of the song

10.12.22  9:41 am   What's Kansas 

      "the in between state"

10.12.22  7:51 am   why do bridges need to exist?

      why do you need to go from here to there

10.12.22  1:55 am   do the friends in '2 friends on the beach' have names

      probably but i don't know what they are

10.12.22  1:28 am   where does ur inspiration come from?

      from the toilet, in the gutter. bet you didn't think they had toilets in the gutter, well here i am, as living proof

10.12.22  1:20 am   what's the notes and note values (essentially sheet music I guess) of the "goodbye" in where I've been at 2:47

      i'm checking the time stamp on the video version and the song version to see which part you mean, because the time stamps are different in the video or song version. i'm pretty sure you are talking about the video version because there's no goodbye at 2:47 in the song version. it should be about like this, roughly. during "bye----" the notes may be stretched a bit more evenly, with the low Db and every 4th note after that (Eb, C) certainly landing squarely on the dotted quarter

10.11.22  11:38 pm   Will you meditate with me?

      sure

10.11.22  11:21 pm   how do you deal with an inconvenient amount of apricots

      put them up for adoption

10.11.22  11:11 pm   Have you ever seen anything more beautiful than corn?

      i don't recall

10.11.22  10:25 pm   is it a sin to play Canon in Db instead of D?

      no, but it might be rude to leave "Db" in the title with no mention of the key change

10.11.22  9:16 pm   do you like to drink mayonnaise straight from the bottle

      no

10.11.22  8:59 pm   How many fish do you have?

      0 but i may have lost count at this point

10.11.22  8:57 pm   how do i start to feel ok?

      try something different or the same

10.11.22  8:20 pm   since the two friends didn't get desert, do you think its an acceptable theory that the desert could've been lobster?

     no. depending on what the 'lobster section' is, that would be problematic either way. either the lobster section is meant for lobster customers (lobsters who have come to the restaurant for dinner), in which case lobsters being on the dessert menu would be terrifying to those lobster customers, or, let's say the 'lobster section' is just a section where they serve lobster, then it would seem unlikely that they would serve lobster outside the lobster section, because that would nullify the point of having a lobster section

     do you like lobster?

     i like them for dramatic purposes

10.11.22  8:13 pm   What is the sound of one hand clapping?

      a little bit quieter and softer than 2

10.11.22  7:33 pm   Opinions on energy drinks?

      they have different legal regulations for what colors they can put on the package

10.11.22  5:11 pm   what personality type are you

      average

10.11.22  3:40 pm   why is school so stupid

      they're trying to trick you into making a better school, when you get a chance

10.11.22  3:07 pm   what is the optimal size for a question mark

      the same height as the capital letter S

10.11.22  12:35 pm   when can I put up christmas decorations? 

      any time

10.11.22  11:50 am   what's your opinion on the word 'defenestration'?

      more of a conversation piece than an actual word

10.11.22  11:24 am   Do you hold any animosity for magic 8-balls

      no

10.11.22  10:37 am   opinion on ladders?

      not as easy as they look to climb

10.11.22  10:01 am   is there really a good reason to have a whole lobster section?

     yes, for the drama

     Are there other sections of the restaurant dedicated to certain foods?

     not that i know of

10.11.22  8:43 am   whats your opinion on alfredo,

     it's something. unfortunately i don't know much else about it. i can confirm this every time i try it. i immediately realize, "ah yes, something"

     or maybe even pasta

     that's a lot of different things

10.11.22  2:37 am   have you ever dialed 867-5309?

      no
